title: kavalaiyin tollai
sahitya:
kavalaiyin tollai illai en manamE kandanin karuNai undanukkirundAl


anupallavi

  avani tanil kaDal alaigaLaip-pOlavE aDuttiDu avadigaL koDuttiDum koDiya


caraNam    ponnum poruLum unnaik-kedDukkAdu pOgha vAzhkkaiyin mOham aDukkAdu
 tannalap-pAsahttin pinnaloDukkAdu cenni malai vAsan ponnaDi piDittAl
